file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.test.payrun.io
info:
  contact:
    x-twitter: PayRun_io
  description: Open, scableable, transparent payroll API.
  title: PayRun.IO
  version: 21.22.3.23
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - financial
  x-logo:
    url: https://twitter.com/PayRun_io/profile_image?size=original
  x-origin:
    - format: openapi
      url: https://api.test.payrun.io/swagger/json
      version: "3.0"
  x-providerName: payrun.io
externalDocs:
  description: External Documents
  url: https://developer.test.payrun.io/docs
